name: 2001 A Doom Oddyssey: Episode 1 demo release
description: Episode 1 of 2001 A Doom oddyssey is a 9 level episode for the ultimate Doom. All the levels are E1 base style to capture the original Doom feel. This is like a shareware version of 2001 A Doom Oddyssey. There is episode 2, 3 and 4 in progress. The full release will come out sometime next year and will contain all 4 episodes, a total re capturing of the Doom experience.
